DOC.brief_summary: Albiglutide develop treatment type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) adjunct diet exercise , monotherapy , combination exist therapy approve United States ( US ) Food Drug Administration ( FDA ) , European Medicines Agency ( EMA ) regulatory agency . This extension study comprise 2 study period : treatment ( 26 week ) post-treatment follow-up ( 8 week ) . A maximum 300 subject eligible take part extension study .
